title: Amazing 2 bedroom/ 2 bath unit
posting_body: ['INCLUDED BOAT SLIP for up to 26 ft boat!', 'NO Fixed bridges!', 'Amazing 2 bedroom/ 2 bath unit in desirable Three Islands.', 'Kitchen is open and Modern with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances.', 'Huge master suite.', '2 Parking spaces!', 'Spacious balcony accessible from living room and master bedroom.', 'Washer/Dryer inside unit!', 'Anchor Bay is a great building with a grande lobby - Marina, Gym, Spa, Fabulous Pool area, Tennis Court, BBQ area, rooftop lounge with gorgeous views.', 'Walking distance to park, CVS, restaurants, & stores.', 'UNIT AVAILABLE STARTING SEPTEMBER 7.', '300 Three Islands Blvd # 305 with boat space HALLANDALE BEACH, FL 33009-2829', 'PROPERTY ID:  GTA11247821', 'Type of Property: CONDO', 'List Price:\t$2,800', 'Bedrooms:  2', 'Bathrooms: 2', 'SqFt (Liv):¤1,221', 'CALL OR TEXT TODAY', 'show contact info', 'Global Trust Realty, LLC posts properties for a 30 day period of time.', ' Due to current high rental demand, some properties advertised may be withdrawn, cancelled, rented, pending or sold within the past 30 days.', ' All prices are subject to change based upon availability.', 'All information is deemed to be correct but not guaranteed.', 'Listed and Brokered by:Optimar International Realty']
